p: THEIC-MR-P (100 mmol), 13.08 g (110 mmol) of propargyl bromide solution and 15.3 g (110 mmol) of potassium carbonate were mixed in 60 mL of acetone, which was stirred at 65 °C for 12 h. The product was obtained after washing with deionized water and purification by evaporating under vacuum. Figure 6 shows the synthesis of propargyl ether THEIC-MR-P.
